Text: Has anyone got ep 8 onwards? i got the first 7

I'm dishing them out 1 day at a time - this is MVGroup's policy. Yes, I know it's a pain but normally it's one episode every 2 days. As there's 20 episodes I could be dead by the time we reach the end.

Tomorrow 6th Feb 2010 will be episode 8.
Checkout the website forums[dot]mvgroup[dot]org
You need to register to login. Sorry about the delay.
